thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 17 of 3563
thread.title: J R CROWLEY
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by J R CROWLEY

author: J R CROWLEY
title: J R CROWLEY
text: You would think that all these book people were just hovering over their computers waiting for my order to come in. I ordered around 15 books two weeks ago, and half of them were on my shelves within the week! The rest arrived shortly after. Even the books that are rated acceptable are plenty fine to read, so I have no complaints whatever. I recommend your website to anyone who reads, especially those who want to read an entire series by one author. You can get the next one when you need it. What a great resource you are. Thanks.
